title: How to Lee Sin | Part 1 (Basics,Pros/Cons, Ganking) | Challenger Jungler (Zazuu)

embed.description: In this video I talk about Basics of Lee Sin (Pros/Cons, Runes, Masteries, Skill Order) and Ganking. There's also a surprise at the end of the video so watch till the end.

body:
Yo wassup guys, Zazuu here.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dNcimOv-4e4
This is Part 1 to my Lee Sin guide. It covers the basics (runes masteries skill level order etc), Pros and Cons of Lee Sin, and the most important part is How to Gank as Lee Sin.
Watch till the end cause I gotta surprise for the niggas that helped me get my last video to 1k views.
Stay classy x
